title: Employee Input on Recognition System
principle: Principle 9: We will recognize those employees and suppliers who demonstrate genuine commitment and measurable quality improvement.
purpose: To sample opinions regarding the need and potential form of a new or modified employee recognition system for Park 500.

questions.question: Would you know when an individual or group of employees is practicing the Q500 philosophy or using the problem solving tools of SPC?
questions.follow_up: Can you name specific examples today?

questions.question: Do you believe that we should recognize the following groups when they live by Q500 philosophy and achieve significant quality improvement of products, processes, services or work life?
What kind of recognition do you think is appropriate?
Please explain which existing recognition methods (formal or informal) complement Q500?

note: If you require additional space for your answers, please use back of sheet.
